message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I was placing a bet on the tennis match, and right before I confirmed, the odds changed unfairly. Why did that happen?
I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can take a look at your account and investigate the issue. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Lisa Green, my email is lisa.g@example.com, and my date of birth is November 25, 1991.
Thanks, Lisa. That's all correct! I completely understand how this can be frustrating. Odds can change frequently due to live market updates, player performance, and betting trends.
But I feel like it changed the moment I clicked the button. That doesn't seem right.

I understand how that might seem, Lisa. The odds are updated in real-time and can change at any second based on market conditions. This ensures that bets reflect the most accurate data available. However, I can review the details of your bet placement for you.
Yes, please check if there was an issue with my bet.

I've checked your bet history, and the odds did adjust just before confirmation due to a change in betting volume and live game developments. Unfortunately, these changes are automatic and outside our control.
Okay, I get it now. Is there any way to lock in odds sooner?

Great question! To secure odds more effectively, we recommend enabling the 'Accept Odds Changes' option in your bet settings. This allows you to accept small fluctuations automatically and avoid delays.
That’s helpful, thanks. I'll give that a try.
You're very welcome, Lisa! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
